400,-100,300,350,60,-1;300,350,280,250,40,0;280,250,-100,100,60,-1;;;
-50,400,120,260,60,1;120,260,260,190,50,1;260,190,360,170,40,1;360,170,530,150,60,1;;;
50,-100,50,900,1000,0;;;
210,-100,290,180,40,1;290,180,250,220,40,-1;250,220,290,260,40,1;290,260,-100,300,60,-1;;;
-100,200,580,200,140,1;;;
220,-100,150,-50,40,1;150,-50,220,0,40,-1;     220,0,150,50,40,-1;150,50,220,100,40,1;220,100,150,150,40,-1;     150,150,220,200,40,1;220,200,150,250,40,-1;     150,250,220,300,40,1;220,300,150,350,40,-1;     150,350,220,400,40,1;220,400,150,450,40,-1;     150,450,220,500,40,1;220,500,150,550,40,-1;     150,550,220,600,40,1;220,600,150,650,40,-1;     150,650,220,700,40,1;220,700,150,750,40,-1;     150,750,220,800,40,1;220,800,150,850,40,-1;     150,850,220,900,40,1;;;
-100,130,100,150,40,1;     100,150,180,200,30,1;     180,200,200,300,30,1;     200,300,180,400,30,-1;     180,400,100,450,30,-1;     100,450,-100,470,40,-1;;;



//  <-- Trennzeichen für den Code

Weg der Gegner
x_start, y_start, x_end, y_end, Frames, ModelArt [-1 = left] [0 = normal] [1 = right]

Es wird immer der komplette Weg in ein Listenelement geladen und dann komplett abgefragt
